Package org.ginsim.gui.graph

Class EditActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.gui.graph.EditActionManager
  • public class EditActionManager
extends Object
    Manage the available interactive edition action. This class provides the GUI logics to select the current edit mode. It always provides a "Select or move" action and will add a "delete" action as well as "add edge" and "add node" actions depending on the selected graph.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

    • Constructor Summary

      Create an action manager with a list of specific edit actions

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedAction

        public EditAction getSelectedAction()
        Returns:
        the currently selected edit action

      • setSelectedAction

        public void setSelectedAction​(EditAction action)
        Change the selected edit action. If the provided action was already selected, it will be locked.
        Parameters:
        action -

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(EditAction action)
        Warn the manager that an action was performed. Depending on the lock state, the selected action will be reverted to the default edit mode.
        Parameters:
        action - the action that was performed. It should be the same as the selected one

        public void select​(Object o)

        Fill the toolbar with buttons matching the available edit actions.
        Parameters:
        toolbar -
